Name: SMF30OPI
Description: z/OS UNIX process ID.

Name: SMF30OPG
Description: z/OS UNIX process group ID.

Name: SMF30OUI
Description: z/OS UNIX process user ID.

Name: SMF30OUG
Description: z/OS UNIX process user group ID.

Name: SMF30OSI
Description: z/OS UNIX process session ID.

Name: SMF30OSC
Description: Number of z/OS UNIX services requested by the process. When the z/OS UNIX parmlib option SYSCALL_COUNTS is set to NO, there is no collection of data for the count of syscalls. When gathering syscall counts for a job, do not switch between SYSCALL_COUNTS=YES and SYSCALL_COUNTS=NO because doing so can lead to inaccurate values in the SMF30OSC field.

Name: SMF30OST
Description: Total CPU time (in hundredths of a second) accumulated by z/OS UNIX services requested by the process. Note that the value in SMF30OST is already included in fields SMF30CPT or SMF30CPS. When the z/OS UNIX parmlib option SYSCALL_COUNTS is set to NO, there is no collection of data for CPU usage. When gathering CPU usage for a job, do not switch between SYSCALL_COUNTS=YES and SYSCALL_COUNTS=NO because doing so can lead to inaccurate values in the SMF30OST field.

Name: SMF30ODR
Description: Number of z/OS UNIX directory reads for the process.

Name: SMF30OFR
Description: Read I/O block count for z/OS UNIX regular files.

Name: SMF30OFW
Description: Write I/O block count for z/OS UNIX regular files.

Name: SMF30OPR
Description: Read I/O block count for z/OS UNIX pipes and AF_UNIX sockets.

Name: SMF30OPW
Description: Write I/O block count for z/OS UNIX pipes and AF_UNIX sockets.

Name: SMF30OSR
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OSW
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OLL
Description: Number of pathname lookup calls to the logical file system.

Name: SMF30OLP
Description: Number of pathname lookup calls to the physical file system.

Name: SMF30OGL
Description: Number of pathname generation calls to the logical file system.

Name: SMF30OGP
Description: Number of pathname generation calls to the physical file system to determine a pathname.

Name: SMF30OPP
Description: Parent process ID.

Name: SMF30OKR
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OKW
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OMS
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OMR
Description: Reserved.

Name: SMF30OSY
Description: Number of times the sync() function was called
